channel.title: Server Client
channel.description:
Now, think of all the posts asking if it was possible or if their was a way to get their own game client. Kind of like the real RS2 how it connects only to a specific server. I would like to point out that this is very possible, but it will take more then one person to do it.
I have a decompiled version of MoparScape 3.1 zipped and uploaded.
The problem here is it came stock with errors immediately after decompiling. So listen.
Since so many people want their own spiffy client, and there are alot of capable programmers on this forum, why not we group together sharing work off what I have uploaded to make this possible.
It is already uploaded, but before I post the link to the .zip that contains, an unextracted form, extracted form, and decompiled form, with decompiler for the MoparScape client, I would like some people to post what they think on it, if I get enough posts saying that this is a good idea and they want to participate I will start to distribute the link. So, how about it? :P

@Runedeadly wrote:

No, I don’t have any loaded.
